thread.title: Yes, She Can: How Oprah Derailed Trump's Cabinet Pick, an Imagined Tale
thread.title_full: Yes, She Can: How Oprah Derailed Trump's Cabinet Pick, an Imagined Tale

title: Yes, She Can: How Oprah Derailed Trump's Cabinet Pick, an Imagined Tale
text: CLINTON: What word is she saying? WINFREY: A h bbiitttt! CLINTON: Everyone stop speaking, please. You're upsetting the ancient owls who bear the souls of our foremothers. And also you're giving me a headache. GIF WINFREY: I'm just calling to report in on Pudzer. CLINTON: Explain this mission to me again. YATES: Oprah had Pudzer's ex-wife on her show years ago. The government asked for the footage, which only Oprah had. She obliged. CLINTON: I love it. Sounds very simple. No strings. No trace. WINFREY: EXAAAACTLY! I'm just an American citizen doing my duty. Never mind that I could literally bring about the downfall of every person in Washington if I wanted. CLINTON: Amazing that the entire time your television show was running you were slowly building a cache of information on enemies of the United States. WINFREY: It's a hobby. CLINTON: So you were saying hobby? WINFREY: Now I garden, though. I'm out of the political game. Oprah pauses. Another sly smile escapes the shadow of Yates' hat. Suddenly the three women explode into laughter. GIF The peals echo off the chamber walls, shaking the brackets holding the televisions and waking the ancient owls. The sound travels down the darkened hallway, past Beyoncé's secret birthing chamber, up the grand staircase and into the main lobby where the hundreds of agents, operatives, forest nymphs and the punk band that rents space file in for the day's work. GIF Above them, the pine needles on the forest floor shifted imperceptibly as the sound waves reached the surface. The woods were empty but the ground was alive. And soon, they would rise. Follow R. Eric Thomas on Twitter . More from ELLE:
